category.name: Change Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CM_varianthistory_extra_columns
preference.preference_description: Determines which fields of the BOM change form are included in the Variant Change History dialog box. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values; each string must contain a persistent property of the BOM change form, using the following syntax: CM_varianthistory_extra_columns= Form-Field1 Form-Field2
